# Manage Packages And Adjust Package Quantities

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/manage-packages-and-adjust-package-quantities/

## Category
06 Gift Cards And Packages

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
PACKAGES
Manually Adding Packages and Adjusting Package Quantities

If you sold a package outside of Mangomint, you can manually add the package to Mangomint. You should only do this if you have already received payment for the package.

You can also manually adjust the remaining quantities in a package if needed.

Link copied
Manually adding packages

You should only manually add a package if you have already received payment for the package. If you need to sell a package, follow these steps.

To manually add a package, you must be an Admin user, or you must have the Can manage packages permission enabled in Staff Member settings.

Open the Packages app and select Add Package.

Select the client who will be using the package. Select the package.

Select Create Package.

Link copied
Manually adjusting the remaining quantities in a package

To manually adjust the remaining quantities in a package, you must be an Admin user, or you must have the Can manage packages permission enabled in Staff Member settings.

Open the Packages app or select the Packages tab in the client details.

Select Adjust Quantities from the "..." menu.

Update the quantity and select Save.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.

© Mangomint, Inc. All rights reserved.
